Description: Mould-made pottery carinated lamp with a short splayed nozzle and a small depressed filling-hole area. The wide rounded shoulder is decorated with four raised bosses and patterns of chevrons flanked by ridges. On top of the nozzle is a shield-shaped pattern. The lamp stands on a base-ring.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2091)
